import sys

N = int(sys.stdin.readline())
S = sys.stdin.readline().rstrip()

for s in S:
    print(chr(ord(s) + N) if ord(s) + N <= ord('Z') else chr(ord(s) + N - ord('Z') + ord('A') - 1), end='')

# ord(): character to integer
# chr(): integer to character

print('hello')
print('hello')
import sys

n = int(sys.stdin.readline())
s = sys.stdin.readline().strip()

for i in range(len(s)):
    if ord(s[i]) + n > ord('Z'):
        print(chr(ord(s[i]) + n - 26), end="")
    else:
        print(chr(ord(s[i]) + n), end="")

# ord() : character to integer

import sys



N = int(sys.stdin.readline())
S = sys.stdin.readline().rstrip()

for s in S:
    print(chr(ord(s) + N) if ord(s) + N <= ord('Z') else chr(ord(s) + N - ord('Z') + ord('A') - 1), end='')  # ord() : character to integer, chr() : integer to character

for s in S:

# ord() : character to integer
# chr() : integer to character
import sys

n = int(sys.stdin.readline())
s = sys.stdin.readline()

for i in range(len(s)):
    if ord(s[i]) + n > ord('Z'):
        print(chr(ord(s[i]) + n - 26), end="")
    else:
        print(chr(ord(s[i]) + n), end="")
